sub_title: Supply Chain & Logistics | Account Management | 3PL & Freight Forwarding | SC Planning & Coordination
summary:
Highly motivated and team-oriented young employee with +6 years of experience and professional development. Interested in and recently (2 years) joined the Supply Chain and Logistics field, with main focus on freight transportation; i) air, ii) ocean, iii) rail, iv) road v) intermodal. Capable of conducting critical analysis of business requirements and offering solutions for business efficiency, productivity, sustainability and profitability. Equipped with work ethic, a strong sense of responsibility, flexibility to adapt fast and willingness to relocate and change environment based on business needs.  

Based in the Netherlands and recently employed in Amsterdam as Account (Operations) Manager @ Sennder Benelux (ex Uber Freight); branch of the Sennder Group, the leader in European market when it comes to digital road freight forwarding. Member of the spot business team, performed both operational and commercial roles. Experienced with inland (mostly road, but also intermodal) shipping, account management, transport planning and coordination. 

With a previous 7-month global supply chain internship experience, worked in Utrecht @ Jacobs Douwe Egberts Professional (HQ) and the Supply Chain Equipment & Spares Department, which marked the end of my studies and the entry into the professional sphere of supply chain management and logistics operations. Experienced with contracted freight business, global logistics, different modes of transport,  inbound and outbound operations.

awards.title: Online Marketing Rockstars Festival, 2018, Hamburg, DE
awards.description:
Ranked 1st group for the course of Innovation, as an award of executed group projects with a team of international students; conducted presentations to university officials and people who run start-ups about an innovative digital application, and was selected with my groupmates to attend the event with a paid ticket by the university.
A great seminar with the topic of Innovative Online Ideas.

projects.title: MASTER THESIS: THE POTENTIAL IMPACT OF BREXIT ON IRISH MARITIME TRADE
projects.description:
Why and How can Ireland benefit and possess the country higher in the supply chain field post-Brexit.
Switch from the UK landbridge to direct sea connections with the EU, creating a logistics hub area at the South-East, between the ports of Cork and Rosslare Europort.

projects.title: SUPPLY CHAIN NETWORK DESIGN
projects.description:
Development of the supply chain network for a Chinese multinational, home-appliances and consumer electronics company, starting from Qingdao, China to the European consumers.
Use of Simplex Method to minimize costs (transport (inland & sea), warehousing, inventory) & CO2 emissions in terms of sustainability, reaching out to the optimal design.

profile_positions.description:
- Account Manager within the Spot Market Operations Team 
- Commercial Awareness
Primary contact, connected shippers with carriers
Maintained high-level of account and customer-relationship management via salesforce
Built strong relationships, enhanced business development by identifying new potential opportunities
Solution-oriented with a customer-focused service, communicated and troubleshot issues 
Business reports to point out escalations and increase business productivity
- Administrative support as freight forwarder
Project Management and Ownership on international inland shipping (end to end processes) 
As transport planner, received and planned shipments, and executed lane management
Negotiated and provided reliable and competitive price quotations for the delivery (FTL, refrigerated, ADR, groupage & LTL, general & special cargo, other) of goods and companies from any industry
Transport Coordinator tasks during execution:
Sourced and secured proper capacity for coverage; (in favor of the shipper) optimal carrier selection in terms of i) meeting shipment requirements ii) on-time performance, iii) tracking level iv) green business/sustainability (intermodal in some cases) v) total gross margin)
Created and uploaded the shipments in the TMS and sent the document to the drivers
Timeslot booking to secure pickup and delivery as requested by the shipper, based on driver's ETA
Dispatched the shipments 
Order tracking, Transparency, Visibility and Proactive communication about incidents
Direct report to the shipper about carrier delay and any other update
Timely contact with the drivers for their driving conditions and transport update
Provided Bill of Landing and Proof Of Delivery documents 
Claims, finance and Invoicing issues
- Operational Excellence
Followed and developed new SOPs to meet and exceed customers' requirements
Outsourced tasks to BPO and enhanced business efficiency
Cost control, data analysis & KPIs to fix operational and other business costs
profile_positions.title: Account Operations Manager

profile_positions.description:
Transitioned seamlessly from a student to a dedicated professional in the SCM & Logistics industry
Served as an intern within the JDE Professional Department (HQ) for the procurement and inbound logistics of the Supply Chain Equipment & Spares Team 
Coordinated activities among three integral teams: demand planners, logistics and master data 
Tracked and traced the Purchase Orders, while handling new Order Confirmations and Delivery Notes from the suppliers
Maintained data accuracy within the system, SAP ERP, and sent EDI confirmation-messages to the stakeholders to validate the deliveries
Collaborated closely with the suppliers, warehouse operator, and 3PLs to preempt operational bottlenecks, ensuring timely and successful fulfillment of agreed deliveries (OTIF)
For EU suppliers: managed road transport, securing contracted volume shipments twice per week
For global/non-EU suppliers: Navigated intricate logistics scenarios, opting for air-freight in urgent situations (such as China port closures during covid-19) and sea-freight for standard circumstances. Expertly tracked containers and vessels via shipping portal to the Port of Rotterdam, then intermodal transfer through the Train Container Terminal and finally, to the warehouse
Prepared and processed the CMR documents to ensure the completion of transportation operations
Engaged in daily correspondence with outbound markets and Distribution Centers to ensure real-time stock availability updates
Demonstrated data analysis through MS Excel, methodically assessing the consolidated tendersheet for global potential tenders, calculated operational costs related to Gross Working Capital and evaluated logistics KPIs (per supplier and carrier). Transformed the results into impactful insights via detailed MS PowerPoint presentations, subsequently shared with senior management
Actively participated in global forecasting and tender projects, contributing to the strategic growth and development of the organization
profile_positions.title: Global Supply Chain Internship

profile_positions.description:
Stepped into the role of Social Media Marketing Manager within the Sales Team
Engaged directly with customers, addressing advertising inquiries through social media communication
Executed the development of social media strategies and impactful promotional campaigns
Skillfully curated content and fostered an expanded online network
Adeptly managed time while overseeing the company's multifaceted social media channels and enhanced communication, critical thinking and marketing skills
Coordinated meetings with prospective clients, strategically explored advertising opportunities and conveyed potential leads to the company's upper management
profile_positions.title: Social Media Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Launched my professional journey as a valued contributing author, showcasing my expertise through published articles featured on the company's official website
Cultivated and refined my creative writing prowess, while actively engaging as a writer. Leveraged my skills to promote advertisements and highlight key city events
Skillfully harnessed the art of advertising, honed meticulous research capabilities, and demonstrated adept editing skills. Showcased my keen reading comprehension and a high degree of time management
profile_positions.title: Columnist, Advertiser

volunteer_experiences.description:
- Served 9 months of mandatory Greek military service, but was my personal decision to move at the army hospital and provide with both military service and medical assistance 
- Assisted with administrative duties and enforced security measures within the hospital due to the updated restrictions for COVID-19
- Responsible for stock-availability of face masks and other covid-19 related equipment and distribute to other soldiers, as well as doctors and other hospital staff

- Responsible for kids, whose age ranges from 6 to 13, during summer holidays
- Increased liabilities, primarily because of children's care and secondarily because for their fun
- Supported various operational areas and executed programs for kids under the topics of sustainability and innovation
